pages.text: There is where we want to say thank you for reading this guide to the end. Let's acknowledge and credit the people who've helped make this guide. $(br2)$(l)Written by:$() $(o)The Poetic Bard Athenia$() $(br)$(l)Published by:$() $(o)Advanced Darkness Prints$() $(br)$(l)Special Thanks To$()... $(o)Lady$() $(k)Saintess Morgana$()
